official_title: A bill to amend the Act of August 13, 1946, to increase the Federal contribution to 90 per centum of the cost of shore restoration and protection projects.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to increase the maximum Federal contribution for publicly-owned shore restoration and protection projects to 90 percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of August 13, 1946, to increase the Federal contribution to 90 per centum of the cost of shore restoration and protection projects.
